title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1705.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1705.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part shall be to ensure that body imaging scanning
equipment is used in correctional facilities to prevent the entry of contraband, in a manner that ensures the
safety and security of incarcerated individuals, visitors and employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1705.1

Adopted

New

York State Register December 13, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 50, eff. 12/13/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
